briefTitle: Pecha Kucha Method Effects on Posttraumatic Growth and Psychological Resilience
officialTitle: Education Given to Breast Cancer Patients Receiving Chemotherapy With Pecha Kucha Method Effects on Posttraumatic Growth and Psychological Resilience
conditions: Posttraumatic Growth, Psychological Resilience, Breast Cancer Patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients over 18 years of age
* At least one course of adjuvant chemotherapy prior to treatment,
* Literacy
* Communicable patients
* Patients who agreed to participate in the study

Exclusion Criteria:

* With a psychiatric diagnosis,
